colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I KYI THA MA RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, MI DANG MI MIN RNAMS KYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG DUS SHIN TU MTHO SHIN PHUN TSOGS PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHI YI GUNG THER GI GI CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON GRUB SH'AKYA DGE SLONG DZNYA NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO,, ,,)
